full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A (CES SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,AA LAG SH'A NAS BYANG PHYOGS SKYED DGU'I 'DREN MCHOG DAM PAR GYUD PA KUN GROL NO MON HAN RIN PO CHES, BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS, RNGUL GYI MAndAL DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,) @018B 'JAM MGON NGAG LA DBANG PA'I BLO'I RTZAL GYIS, ,TSIG DON DBYANGS SU MKHAS SA BO NA BZANG, ,RNAM BKRA'I LAM GSUM 'DAB BRGYA BZHAD PA'I RTZIS, ,BSKAL BZANG RIG PA 'GRUB CHEN SPAR BTABS STE, ,LTA SPYOD SPRIN GYIS MA BSGRIBS BSTAN PA'I MKHA', ,BSTAN 'DZIN NYI ZLA'I GZI YIS GSAL BA DANG, ,RIGS GSUM PHAN BDE'I LO TOG CHER RGYAS TE, ,THEG GSUM SA LAM 'BRAS BU MYUR SMON SHOG ,RGYU SBYOR GTZO BYAS LUS CAN TSE RABS KUN, ,DAL 'BYOR PHRENG RDOG BSTAN PA'I SRAD BUR STAR, ,THEG MCHOG BSHES GNYEN RAG GIS NYER MDZES LAS, ,'JIG RTEN KUN GYI RGYAN DU GYUR BAR SHOG ,(CES SA LAM RNAM BZHAG GI SPAR BYANG 'DI RGYU SBYOR BA DA LAS THU SHE GUNG GI SHOG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI 'DOD MOS LTAR BRIS, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
